allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix high-impact type errors \(Document.report, secureToolCall, undefined checks\)

Fixed 43 TypeScript errors across three categories:

1. Document.report Property \(16 errors fixed\):
- Added optional ''report'' property to Document interface
- Allows legacy LangGraph analysis data to be accessed
- Files: src/lib/documents/types.d.ts
- Impact: Fixes all medical-terms-migration.ts errors

2. Private Property Access \(13 errors fixed\):
- Changed secureToolCall from private to public in MedicalExpertTools
- Allows secureMcpTools object to call security wrapper
- Files: src/lib/context/mcp-tools/medical-expert-tools.ts
- Impact: Fixes all MCP security wrapper access errors

3. Object Possibly Undefined \(14 errors fixed\):
- Added null checks for series[0].referenceRange access
- Added undefined checks for d3.extent\(\) results  
- Files: src/components/documents/SignalHistory.svelte
- Impact: Prevents runtime errors in lab value charting

Results:
- Before: 806 errors
- After: 763 errors
- Improvement: 43 errors fixed

Total Progress:
- Started: 858 errors, 64 warnings \(169 files\)
- Current: 763 errors, 60 warnings \(160 files\)
- Total fixed: 95 errors \(11.1%\), 4 warnings, 9 fewer files

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
